topics.title: Describe a happy memory
topics.prompt: Talk about a happy moment you have experienced recently.
topics.hint: 描述一個你最近經歷過的快樂時刻，可以說出發生了什麼和你為什麼覺得快樂。
topics.sample: Last weekend, I spent time with my family at the park. We played games and laughed a lot. It was a very happy day because I felt close to them.

topics.title: Share a time you felt sad
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you felt sad and explain why.
topics.hint: 說明你感到悲傷的一次經歷，可以包含原因和你的感受。
topics.sample: One time, I lost my favorite book. I felt very sad because I loved reading it. It took me a long time to find it again.

topics.title: Talk about hope
topics.prompt: Explain what hope means to you and describe a hopeful situation.
topics.hint: 說明希望對你的意義，並舉例一個充滿希望的情況。
topics.sample: Hope means believing good things will happen. For example, I hope to travel abroad someday after I finish my studies.

topics.title: Describe your favorite place
topics.prompt: Talk about a place that makes you feel happy and explain why.
topics.hint: 描述一個讓你快樂的地方，可以是家裡、公園或其他地方，說明原因。
topics.sample: My favorite place is the beach near my house. The sound of the waves and fresh air make me feel calm and happy.

topics.title: Explain friendship
topics.prompt: Describe what friendship means to you and why it is important.
topics.hint: 說明友誼是什麼，以及為什麼你認為友誼重要。
topics.sample: Friendship means having people who support you and share your feelings. It is important because friends make life better.

topics.title: Talk about how nature unites us
topics.prompt: Explain how nature, like mountains and oceans, connects people around the world.
topics.hint: 談論自然（山脈、海洋等）如何讓全世界的人彼此連結。
topics.sample: Nature is everywhere, so mountains and oceans connect people from different countries. We all enjoy the beauty of the earth.

topics.title: Describe a moment of laughter
topics.prompt: Share a funny experience that made you laugh recently.
topics.hint: 描述一件最近讓你大笑的有趣事情，說明發生了什麼和你的感覺。
topics.sample: I laughed a lot when my friend told a funny joke at school. It made the whole class smile and feel happy.

topics.title: Compare laughter and sorrow
topics.prompt: Talk about how laughter and sorrow are both important parts of life.
topics.hint: 討論笑聲和悲傷是人生中兩個重要的部分，說明原因。
topics.sample: Laughter makes us feel joy, but sorrow teaches us lessons. Both help us grow and understand life better.

topics.title: Imagine a small world
topics.prompt: Describe what you think a 'small world' means and what it looks like.
topics.hint: 想像並描述你心中的“小世界”，可以談談它的特點和感覺。
topics.sample: I think a small world is a place where everyone is close and helps each other. It feels safe and friendly.

topics.title: Express feelings about love
topics.prompt: Talk about what love means to you and how it shows in daily life.
topics.hint: 說出愛對你的意義，以及愛在日常生活中如何表現。
topics.sample: Love means caring and kindness. It can be shown by helping family, hugging friends, or saying kind words.
